trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SEQ_00<tab>Soroban is about to show you a shining, shimmering, splendid new world.

TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SEQ_01<tab>The requisite items have been gathered and given to Soroban, and so he invites you to join him at the western edge of Tamamizu. There, where the water twists and turns on the surface of the dome, he will perform the ritual to let you traverse the depths as easily as any Kojin, that you might begin your search for the Yasakani<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Magatama.

TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SEQ_02<tab>The deep, booming voice of Soroban resounds in your ears as he intones a sacred prayer to the kami of the deep. With a flash of light, it is done, and you are told you can breathe underwater as you would on land. Alisaie's skepticism turns to amazement once she passes through the portal and finds herself in open water, completely at ease. Yet that is not all, for Soroban then summons for you noble steeds of great strength. And so, with the aid of the striped rays, you embark on your journey to Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SEQ_03<tab>It is not long before you arrive at your destination─the underwater village of the Raen. But will these reclusive people be willing to aid your cause?
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lyse.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_LYSE_000_000<tab>I can hardly wait!
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Quite how this blessing is supposed to keep us from drowning remains to be seen...
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SOROBAN_000_010<tab>Are you ready, my friends, to explore a world unlike any you have ever known?
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SOROBAN_000_011<tab>Then let us go to western part of the village, where the water twists and turns, and there complete our preparations for the ritual.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_LYSE_000_020<tab>This is the place, right? Hmm... I'm not sure I like the look of that whirlpool...
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>He dove into the water a moment ago and said to wait here until he returned...

TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Owing to Soroban's blessing, you may now <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>dive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> into deep water and stay submerged indefinitely.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Underwater settlements like Tamamizu and Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato can be accessed via circular portals.

TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>To leave deep water, you need only swim towards the surface. Conversely, to dive into deep water while swimming on the surface, press <var 08 E4E95101 ((<var 48 F20222 /var>[Ctrl+Spacebar]<var 48 01 /var>)) ((<var 1E 0A /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Should you become separated from your steed, speak with Soroban in Tamamizu to mount a striped ray.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SOROBAN_000_050<tab>Were you thrown from your ray? No matter! I shall summon another─assuming that is your wish?
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Mount a striped ray?
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>I'll admit I had my doubts, but this is a “blessing” worthy of the name. One cannot help wondering what other magicks the Kojin possess...
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_LYSE_000_060<tab>This must be Sui<var 1F /var>no<var 1F /var>Sato, the Raen village Soroban told us about.
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_LYSE_000_061<tab>Right, then! Let's see if they can't help us find the Kojin's missing jewel!
TEXT_STMBDA308_02484_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>You may now perform underwater emotes!
